Post Description:
📊 I'm extremely happy to share that I recently joined the Masters of Science in Business Analytics at UC Davis!!! Immensely grateful to Shachi Govil and Rachel Bandelaria for enabling my last-minute entry.

🚀 In just 4 weeks, I've coded over 4,000 lines, a testament to the program's intensity and the exceptional caliber of my peers.

🔍 With the integration of business analytics, I'm confident in refining my approach to understanding the deeper impact of AR/VR technologies and software automation on business needs.

🌐 As I further develop my AR Museum startup, I'm also actively exploring roles in the AR/VR and Software Automation sectors. Here's to leveraging analytics to drive business insights and innovation! I'm excited to share my educational milestone!

👉 Attached Python Cheat Sheet covers many concepts. It is really well-designed, beautiful, informative and covers Python 3 topics from zero to hero.

💫 Time flies, boost your knowledge Pythonistas !!!

👉 Please foloow Fakhar Abbas for more content like this.

#python #python3 #programming #pythonprogramming #development #pythonlearning #cheatsheet #learning #selfstudy #datastructures #software #help #developer #language

I’m happy to share that I’m starting a new position as a Consumer Device Engineer at Meta! Some of you might know I am from Spain, but I grew up in Equatorial Guinea, Africa, where technology wasn't really part of our lives. I always found it fascinating how technology grows at an incredible pace, and not only does it find a way to perfection, but it adapts to our needs. Since I moved to the USA it has been my sole dream to be part of Facebook, as it kept me connected with my family all those years growing up in different continents. 

Today marks my first day at Meta, where I will be working with the Facebook Reality Labs team with Gabriel Molina. I am incredibly thankful to be part of something so big like Meta, and interact closely with the future - the Metaverse.

I wanted to take a minute to thank everyone who pushed me harder to learn new technologies and never let me fall behind. #team #engineer #technology #future #facebook #meta #newbeginings

Post Description: I started my #Leadership path by getting 50+ photographers, artists, and models together from all over #Atlanta, a city where I moved to just a couple of months ago. It's time to diversify your free time into making something you will be remembered for. #ThankYou everyone who joined us! ATL Street Meet 💪. More events to come soon!

Hey guys! Here is the first robotics automation project I do on my own, and I made it 𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐧-𝐬𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐜𝐞! It combines a 𝟑𝐃 𝐩𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐝 file I designed with Shapr3D to hold a remote shutter for your Sony camera and a 𝐏𝐲𝐭𝐡𝐨𝐧 𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐭 that will select parts of the Gcode and replace them with custom ones to make this process work.

Follow the steps in my GitHub to make cool time-lapses like this! Make your 3D prints "grow" in a matter of seconds. I implemented the python script as a plug-in for the Ultimaker Cura Slicer, and this project will work on any Creality Ender printer!

My project has 𝟮𝟴𝟱 𝗱𝗼𝘄𝗻𝗹𝗼𝗮𝗱𝘀 already!!! I can't wait to see how the community uses my project to showcase their 3D prints ❤

https://lnkd.in/gvEKxuZ

#engineering #automationpassion #automation #scripting #robotics #3Dprinting

via Boardish - IT and Cyber That Speaks The Board's Language

Ferrari 250 Testarossa - Rendered in Real-time using Unreal Engine 4.25 and raytracing. Full dynamic lighting with no baking.

Notes : You might recognize this place from Red Dead Redemption 2 (aka Braithwaite manor). I couldn't believe how beautiful this place was when I played the game, and it happens that the place is inspired by the Oak Alley Plantation down in Louisiana. I decided to inspire my self from it and started modeling out in 3DS Max with reference images.
You can imagine the library of cars that went through my mind to recreate this scene. And it's another Ferrari.. Really?

I used SpeedTree (IDV, inc) for the trees, and Quixel Megascans assets for the environment. Car and Manor was textured using Substance by Adobe Painter. 

Manor modeled by me using 3DS Max. 
Car model by Grabcad and customized by me.

EDIT : All High Res now available on my website : https://lnkd.in/gh2TYrt

#unrealengine #raytracing #ue4 #automotive #ferrari #250 #substance #megascans #quadrortx #nvidia #virtualproduction  #cars

SeaSkate keeps pushing me to learn more and to become a better Engineer. Here is an update on the product I am working on. Can you visualize it underneath a Surfboard? This is 3D printed for now but it will be manufactured in Aluminum! #3dprinting #3dmodeling #startup #internationalstudent #surfing #wheels

Hello guys! Here is an update on a new product I am working on! Every single piece (other than the orange wheel) from the screws and bolts to the trucks has been designed and manufactured by me with my 3D printer and using Fusion 360 to make the 3D models. The idea is installing this mechanism at the bottom of a surfboard and ride it on the street! What do you think? I will keep posting the process and update when the board that connects to the custard is fully designed and 3D printed!!
#softwareengineering #mechanicalengineering #3Dprinting #startup
